Title: Object: Flight into Egypt
Description: Holy Family with donkey; working proof. c.1771 Etching
Producer name: Print made by: Francisco de Goya
Bibliographic references: Delteil / Le Peintre-Graveur Illustré (XIXe et XXe siècles) (1)
Exhibition history: 1999 Jan-Mar, Tokyo, Nat Mus of Western Art, 'Goya's Prints'
Acquisition notes: See 1975,1025,10 to 434 for the Tomas Harris collection of prints by Goya. This was accepted by H.M.Treasury in lieu of estate duty on the estates of Tomas and Hilda Harris, and allocated to the British Museum in accordance with the wishes of the late owners. Tomas Harris died in 1964, and it was believed that the allocation had been made in October 1975, and the collection was according registered under this date. The formal allocation was, however, delayed until 1979.
